857130.name: Evolution
857130.description:
Evolution is an atmospheric arcade with elements of a runner performed in an interesting visual style, in which your task is to bring your little character to the end of each level, avoiding the many dangers that await him at every turn.

Users have to help the character get out of the gloomy forest. Soon, colorful landscapes and minor natural obstacles that are encountered on your way will be replaced by dozens of different obstacles
857130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
